text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Winning Ticket's been turning up the<n>heat in the recent
scrimmages.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: FINIIISH! Winning Ticket takes first<n>priiize!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Did you see it?! My outstanding<n>victoryyy! The glory's all
mine,<n>Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Though some days are filled with<n>laughter and joy...

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: I-I lost... No...

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Ug... Waaaaah! This suuucks! I'm<n>retraining from scraaatch!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Other days are filled—no,<n>drowned—with tears.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Both wins and losses continue to pile<n>up. And today...

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Nooooo! I looooost!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: I'm sorry, Trainer! I have to keep<n>training more and more!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
That's it! I'll train sooo hard!<n>Full-speed training! First, a lap
around<n>the track—NO! A lap around Japan!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Ticket's burning herself out like<n>usual, so I rush to give her
a suitable<n>training regimen.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Got it! Thanks! I'm going to hit the<n>track right now!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: I'll use this loss... to propel me into<n>the Derbyyy!

text_block_list.name: Fellow Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Hey, how's it going? Your student's<n>as fired up as they
say.
choice_data_list: She's always at full blast. I'm lucky to have her.

text_block_list.name: Fellow Trainer
text_block_list.text:
I don't doubt it, but... That scrimmage<n>loss shows she's still
a bit rough<n>around the edges.

text_block_list.name: Fellow Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Actually, it's not just that... She's too<n>open with her
feelings.

text_block_list.name: Fellow Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Her mood rouses up the other racers.<n>They see her burst of
speed and feel<n>pushed to try harder.

text_block_list.name: Fellow Trainer
text_block_list.text:
She needs to hide her power and lull<n>her opponents into
being careless. It's<n>an important tactic on the track.

text_block_list.name: Fellow Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Aw, heck. I'm saying too much to a<n>rival trainer. Listen,
don't worry about<n>it... See ya around.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Hello? Trainer! Oh no! Did your spirit<n>leave your body?! No!
Traineeer!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I'm thinking about what that trainer<n>said so much, it seems
to have<n>worried Ticket...
choice_data_list: Sorry, I was a little lost in thought.
Sorry, I was a little lost in thought.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Whahuh?! You're back from the<n>dead! It's a miracle! Oooh!
Thank<n>goodneeess!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Wait, what you were thinking about?<n>Tell me, tell me! I'll
help you think<n>harder! Nnngh!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She's always giving it her all, so I<n>want to do more to help
her win.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
But should I follow the advice and<n>teach her how to hide her
cards?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Ummm, hnnng... I can't take it! What<n>are you worried
about?!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
What can I do to help my most special<n>partner... There must
be somethiiing!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Hnnngh, aaagh!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
However, seeing her try so<n>desperately, just like she
always<n>does, I finally understand.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Huh? Trainer? Oh, hey... You look<n>refreshed somehow.
choice_data_list: I know what to do now.
I know what to do now.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Whoa, really? That's... great! Really<n>great! Whoo-hooo!
choice_data_list: (You need to do what you do best!)
(You need to do what you do best!)

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
I'm set to go. Let's talk about my<n>next regimen! I'll listen at
full power to<n>whatever you say!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
After all, you really see me! You think<n>about me! That's why
I trust you!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
There's no doubt when I'm with you!<n>Not one bit! I can
steam forward<n>without holding anything back!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As if for the first time, I see the trust<n>that shines in her
eyes... And I become<n>determined to truly understand her.
